author: VNExplorer
title: GermÃ¡n Berterame, el argentino que generarÃ­a un escÃ¡ndalo por su posible convocatoria a la SelecciÃ³n Mexicana
text:
De buen desempeÃ±o en la Liga MX, ahora el argentino podrÃ­a ser llamado a la SelecciÃ³n Mexicana. Hay crÃ­ticas al tÃ©cnico Jimmy Lozano por esta posible decisiÃ³n.
Desde hace varios aÃ±os que hay cierto pique entre Argentina y MÃ©xico en cuanto a tÃ©rminos futbolÃ­sticos. Sin embargo, no es ningÃºn secreto que la SelecciÃ³n Mexicana ha aprovechado el talento argentino y hay varios ejemplos al respecto. Esto no para, ya que en aquel paÃ­s se habla de la posibilidad de que GermÃ¡n Berterame, ex delantero de San Lorenzo y actualmente en Rayados de Monterrey, podrÃ­a ser convocado por el tÃ©cnico Jimmy Lozano para el â€˜Triâ€™.
En recientes declaraciones a La Ãšltima Palabra (Fox Sports), el tÃ©cnico del seleccionado mexicano confirmÃ³ que existe la chance de convocar a Berterame, de buen nivel en Monterrey. Esto confirma lo que ciertos medios de aquel paÃ­s habÃ­an adelantado hace algunas semanas.
â€œSÃ­, creo que â€˜Berteâ€™ (GermÃ¡n Berterame) un poco lo mismo que (JuliÃ¡n) QuiÃ±ones y lo que ha pasado con tantos otros. Ã‰l desde antes ya tenÃ­a la intensiÃ³n de naturalizarse. Hablando de QuiÃ±ones no fuimos a convencerlo, fuimos a preguntar cuÃ¡l es tu situaciÃ³n y Ã©l estÃ¡ muy agradecido con el paÃ­s. Ã‰l se siente cÃ³modo, se siente a gusto, quiere competirâ€œ, comentÃ³ Lozano.
GermÃ¡n Berterame iniciÃ³ los trÃ¡mites para nacionalizarse mexicano durante este 2023. Si todo sale bien, los papeles llegarÃ¡n a tiempo para mitad de 2024, lo que podrÃ­a ponerlo como candidato para ser convocado para la prÃ³xima Copa AmÃ©rica. Sin embargo, en MÃ©xico, su posible convocatoria no cae bien.
GermÃ¡n Berterame es figura en Rayados (Getty Images).
Â¿Por quÃ© la convocatoria de Berterame supone un problema para Lozano y la SelecciÃ³n Mexicana? Si Jaime Lozano decide convocatoria a GermÃ¡n Berterame, se volverÃ­a a contradecir con ciertas declaraciones respecto a que le darÃ­a prioridad al jugador nacido en MÃ©xico. Esto se debe al fuerte rechazo por parte del hincha mexicano contra los argentinos, en especial.
â€œSi un jugador se naturaliza tiene que ser, para mÃ­ modo de ver, muy superior, muy por encima de lo que tenemos en MÃ©xico, si tienen un nivel similar yo voy a apostar por el jugador nacional que el extranjeroâ€œ, dijo el entrenador del seleccionado mexicano a mediados de 2023 antes de las semifinales de la Copa Oro de la CONCACAF.
Berterame, en ese entonces, ya estaba en la mira para una posible convocatoria. Lo mismo con el colombiano QuiÃ±ones. Pero sus palabras podrÃ­an generar un escÃ¡ndalo si es que decide llamar al delantero argentino cuando dijo que priorizarÃ­a al mexicano.
Lozano vive una actualidad irregular en la SelecciÃ³n Mexicana y sigue probando opciones en las convocatorias. Viene de apenas lograr la clasificaciÃ³n a la Copa AmÃ©rica y a la ronda final de la Liga de Naciones de la CONCACAF. Si no mejora su situaciÃ³n, su futuro en el â€˜Triâ€™ no parece el mejor.
GermÃ¡n Berterame, el nuevo argentino que jugarÃ­a para la SelecciÃ³n Mexicana GermÃ¡n Berterame lleva cuatro aÃ±os y medio en la Liga MX, luego de que en Argentina jugÃ³ en San Lorenzo y Patronato. Primero, empezÃ³ en AtlÃ©tico San Luis donde fue de menor a mayor y terminÃ³ con buenos nÃºmeros antes de su llegada a Monterrey: 31 goles en 93 partidos jugados. Fue a mitad de 2022 cuando llegÃ³ a Rayados con el pase en su poder. Desde entonces, ha sido la referencia de Ã¡rea de â€˜La Pandillaâ€™, incluso por encima de Rogelio Funes Mori, sobre todo en el Ãºltimo tiempo.
Desde mitad de 2023 su nombre ha sido vinculado con la SelecciÃ³n Mexicana, sobre todo tras sus 20 goles en Monterrey en 52 partidos. Lozano aguarda por su nacionalizaciÃ³n para que se convierta en opciÃ³n para el ataque.
Berterame, jugando para San Lorenzo ante River (Getty Images).
De ser convocado para la selecciÃ³n de MÃ©xico, GermÃ¡n Berterame se sumarÃ¡ a la ya larga lista de jugadores argentinos que decidieron jugar para el â€˜Triâ€™. Entre los futbolistas mÃ¡s destacados que jugaron para el seleccionado azteca se encuentran Rogelio Funes Mori, Guillermo Franco, MatÃ­as Vuoso, Christian GimÃ©nez, Lucas Ayala, Gabriel Caballero y Carlos Lara, entre otros.

author: Omar Ali
title: Beim FC Schalke floppte er: Ex-Torwart steht vor ungewisser Zukunft - DerWesten.de
text:
Die letzte Bundesliga-Saison des FC Schalke 04 ist mittlerweile zwei Jahre her. Es ist also schon die dritte Spielzeit der KÃ¶nigsblauen in der 2. Liga in Folge. Einer, der einen maÃŸgeblichen Anteil am Abstieg 2023 hatte, ist Alexander Schwolow.
Der TorhÃ¼ter war beim FC Schalke 04 kein sicherer RÃ¼ckhalt, leistete sich einige Fehler und stieg dementsprechend dann mit den Knappen ab. Oder doch nicht. Schwolow ging nach seiner Leihe zurÃ¼ck nach Berlin und blieb in der Bundesliga. Jetzt ist er allerdings vereinslos.
Ex-Schalke-Torwart Schwolow vereinslos Zur Saison 2022/23 holte der FC Schalke ihn per Leihe von Hertha BSC. Alexander Schwolow sollte als Nummer eins fÃ¼r den Klassenerhalt sorgen, doch das Gegenteil trat ein. Die Knappen gewannen nur ein Spiel, der Torwart sah bei vielen Gegentoren sehr schlecht aus und hatte nach Ansicht der Fans einen groÃŸen Anteil daran, dass es schlieÃŸlich zum Abstieg kam.
Auch interessant : Eintracht Frankfurt macht offizielle VerkÃ¼ndung: Jetzt kÃ¶nnen es alle sehen
Die Leihe endete, Schwolow kehrte zurÃ¼ck nach Berlin. Besonders bitter fÃ¼r ihn: Auch Hertha BSC stieg in dieser Saison ab. Doch Schwolow ging nicht in die 2. Liga mit einem der beiden Klubs. Stattdessen folgte der Wechsel zu Union Berlin. Dort stand er die vergangenen beiden Spielzeiten unter Vertrag.
Jetzt endete seine Zeit bei den â€žEisernenâ€œ, die ihm sogar ein Angebot zur VertragsverlÃ¤ngerung gemacht hatten. Schwolow lehnte jedoch ab. Seit dem 1. Juli ist der Keeper vereinslos.
Wie geht es fÃ¼r Schwolow weiter? GerÃ¼chte um den ehemaligen Schalke-Keeper gab es zuletzt auch. Der 1. FC KÃ¶ln und der Karlsruher SC sollen Interesse gehabt haben. Die Betonung liegt auf â€žgehabt habenâ€œ. Mittlerweile haben beide Klubs neue TorhÃ¼ter verpflichtet und wollen vermutlich auch keinen weiteren Mann fÃ¼r zwischen den Pfosten holen.
Wie geht es also fÃ¼r Schwolow weiter? Mit seinen 33 Jahren ist er nicht nur nicht mehr der jÃ¼ngste Torwart, sondern hat obendrein in den vergangenen beiden Spielzeiten nur sieben Pflichtspiele absolviert.

author: Europa Sur
title: Ponce, Morante, Roca Rey, Miura... Los nombres de la feria taurina de Algeciras 2024
text: Los carteles que conformarÃ¡n la feria taurina de [Algeciras](https://www.europasur.es/algeciras/) se presentan de manera oficial este viernes en la sala de comisiones del Ayuntamiento con la presencia del alcalde, JosÃ© Ignacio Landaluce, la delegada de Fiestas, Juana Cid, y el empresario del coso de Las Palomas, Carmelo GarcÃ­a. El ciclo, equilibrado sobre el papel al igual que sucediÃ³ el aÃ±o pasado, mezcla a figuras (Ponce, Morante, Roca Rey...) con toreros y ganaderÃ­as del [Campo de Gibraltar](https://www.europasur.es/campo-de-gibraltar/) y la provincia de CÃ¡diz (GalvÃ¡n, Pacheco, La Palmosilla...), ademÃ¡s de satisfacer la cuota "torista" con la de Miura y la de rejones con Diego Ventura. El avance de los carteles es el siguiente: - MiÃ©rcoles 26 de junio. Novillada sin picadores con tres alumnos de la Escuela Taurina de Algeciras y otros tantos de la zona. - Jueves 27 de junio. Toros de NÃºÃ±ez del Cuvillo para Diego Ventura, Alejandro Talavante y AndrÃ©s Roca Rey. - Viernes 28 de junio. Corrida concurso con ganaderÃ­as gaditanas (FermÃ­n BohÃ³rquez, La Palmosilla, El Torero, Fuente Ymbro, Salvador Domecq y Torrealta) para Enrique Ponce, Morante de la Puebla y David GalvÃ¡n. - SÃ¡bado 29 de junio. Toros de Miura para EsaÃº FernÃ¡ndez, Miguel Ãngel Pacheco y otro. Por otro lado, [y como tambiÃ©n adelantÃ³ Europa Sur](https://www.europasur.es/algeciras/Antonio-Sanz-consejero-Presidencia-pregon-Jornadas-Taurinas_0_1889811194.html), el consejero de la Presidencia, Interior, DiÃ¡logo Social y SimplificaciÃ³n Administrativa de la Junta de AndalucÃ­a, Antonio Sanz Cabello, serÃ¡ el encargado de pregonar las XXXVII Jornadas Taurinas de [Algeciras](https://www.europasur.es/algeciras/) que se celebrarÃ¡n a finales del mes de mayo o comienzos de junio.

author: AgÃªncia Lusa
title: PS questiona Governo sobre â€œinaÃ§Ã£o da AICEPâ€ e medidas a adotar para a resolver â€“ Observador
text:
O PS questionou esta quinta-feira o MinistÃ©rio da Economia sobre as crÃ­ticas de que a AICEP â€œestÃ¡ paradaâ€ e sem responder eficazmente Ã s necessidades das empresas, pretendendo os socialistas saber o que vai fazer o Governo para inverter a situaÃ§Ã£o.
Numa pergunta enviada ao ministÃ©rio liderado por Pedro Reis, e a que a agÃªncia Lusa teve acesso, os socialistas recordam que, em 2023, a AgÃªncia para o Investimento e ComÃ©rcio Externo de Portugal (AICEP) â€œfoi responsÃ¡vel pela atraÃ§Ã£o recorde de mais de 3,5 mil milhÃµes de euros em investimento direto estrangeiro, criando milhares de postos de trabalho e reforÃ§ando a posiÃ§Ã£o de Portugal no mercado globalâ€.
â€œ No entanto, tÃªm surgido preocupaÃ§Ãµes sobre o atual desempenho da AICEP , com crÃ­ticas que apontam para uma paralisaÃ§Ã£o da sua atuaÃ§Ã£o em Ã¡reas-chave, nomeadamente no que diz respeito Ã  promoÃ§Ã£o da internacionalizaÃ§Ã£o das empresasâ€, condena.
Os socialistas citam uma recente entrevista ao Jornal de NegÃ³cios e Antena 1 do presidente da AssociaÃ§Ã£o Empresarial de Portugal (AEP), LuÃ­s Miguel Ribeiro, acusou a AICEP de estar parada na articulaÃ§Ã£o com as associaÃ§Ãµes empresariais e de dificultar a realizaÃ§Ã£o de missÃµes ao estrangeiro, apontando Ã  fraca execuÃ§Ã£o do PT20230 que neste momento, disse, ronda os 4%.
PUB â€¢ CONTINUE A LER A SEGUIR
O PS quer que o MinistÃ©rio da Economia diga como avalia â€œo desempenho atual da AICEPâ€ tendo em conta estas crÃ­ticas e pretende que esclareÃ§a que â€œsetores ou Ã¡reas tÃªm sido mais afetados por esta inaÃ§Ã£oâ€.
â€œQue medidas estÃ£o a ser tomadas para garantir que a agÃªncia volte a ser proativa no apoio Ã s empresas, especialmente no contexto global competitivo em que se inseremâ€, questiona.
Os socialistas perguntam ainda que impacto â€œterÃ£o as recentes alteraÃ§Ãµes na administraÃ§Ã£o da AICEP na continuidade das suas polÃ­ticas e na execuÃ§Ã£o das suas funÃ§Ãµesâ€.
â€œ Quais sÃ£o os planos do Governo para recuperar a estabilidade e a eficiÃªncia da agÃªncia â€œ, questionam ainda.
O PS aponta que a AICEP â€œtem sido um pilar essencial na promoÃ§Ã£o do investimento estrangeiro e na internacionalizaÃ§Ã£o das empresas portuguesas, especialmente das pequenas e mÃ©dias empresas (PMEs)â€.
â€œAtravÃ©s da sua rede de escritÃ³rios internacionais, a AICEP desempenha um papel central na captaÃ§Ã£o de investimento e no suporte Ã  expansÃ£o das exportaÃ§Ãµes nacionais, o que Ã© crucial para o crescimento econÃ³mico sustentÃ¡vel do paÃ­sâ€, enfatiza.

author: Lorianne Palinkas
title: I Think American Idol Season 23 Needs A Night With No Ballads (The Past Few Episodes Have Been Putting Me To Sleep)
text:
American Idol season 23 has been a total snoozefest so far, putting me to sleep with every episode, but I think that a night without ballads could energize the show, and really make the finalists shine. American Idol season 23 welcomed back host Ryan Seacrest, along with judges Lionel Richie and Luke Bryan. However, for the first time in the ABC era of the show, there was a shakeup at the judging table as American Idol season 4 winner Carrie Underwood took Katy Perry's place.
American Idol season 23 has now narrowed down its contestants to its Top 10 finalists. They include Thunderstorm Artis, John Foster, Canaan James Hill, Kolbi Jordan, Josh King, Slater Nalley, Breanna Nix, Mattie Pruitt, Jamal Roberts, and Gabby Samone. They're all incredibly talented, but I've found myself very bored during the episodes. I think this is because there have been hardly any upbeat performances throughout the competition so far. The finalists have been relying on ballads to showcase their vocals, but I think a night without ballads could reinvigorate the show.
The American Idol Top 10 Finalists Have Sung Too Many Ballads
They Haven't Taken Advantage Of The Theme Nights
So far, American Idol season 23 has had three theme nights, including Songs of Faith, Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, and Iconic American Idol Moments. Although the finalists gave some extraordinary performances, many of them were ballads, which became very tedious to watch and listen to. On Rock & Roll Hall of Fame night, Carrie lamented that the contestants weren't rocking out, and I agreed with her completely.
While a few of the contestants sang some upbeat songs, including Filo's "With a Little Help from My Friends," Mattie's "Piece of My Heart," John's "Jailhouse Rock," Jamal's "Shout," and Josh's "The Longest Time," the episode concluded with several ballads including, Thunderstorm's "Fire and Rain," Gabby's "Saving All My Love for You," Breanna's "Open Arms," ChÃ©'s "It's a Man's Man's Man's World," and Slater's "Your Song."
Related
20 Best Reality TV Shows Right Now
Reality TV is more popular than ever. With so many to choose from, here are some of the best reality TV shows to stream or watch right now.
In the midst of all of those ballads, Kolbi sang, "You're All I need to Get By," but there were already too many slow songs in a row in order to catch my attention. In addition, it was the third time that "It's a Man's Man's Man's World" was performed in full during the season, with ChÃ© singing it after Amanda Barise and Mattie. I don't understand why the show would allow three contestants to sing the same song in such a short period of time, especially because it's a ballad that doesn't do much to showcase the contestants' personalities.
During Iconic American Idol Moments Night, every single contestant sang ballads. Although their performances were impressive, after two nights in a row of that many ballads, I was exhausted by the end of the show. On both Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Night and Iconic American Idol Moments Night, the contestants could've chosen more upbeat songs instead of so many ballads.
The possibilities from the night's mentor alone, Fantasia Barrino, included "Proud Mary," "Think, "Something to Talk About," "Signed, Sealed, Delivered (I'm Yours)," "I Heard It Through the Grapevine," "Get on Your Feet," "Crazy Little Thing Called Love," "Knock on Wood," "Holding Out for a Hero," and "Chain of Fools," among others. I don't understand why none of the Top 10 finalists took advantage of such an incredible list of songs. I really hope that, during Women in Music Night, mentor Miranda Lambert, who's known for her sassy personality, encourages the Top 10 finalists to choose some uptempo songs that showcase a whole new side to their personalities.
American Idol Used To Have More Upbeat Performances
Contestants Showcased Their Vocals With More Than Just Ballads
I've been watching American Idol since season 1, and some of my favorite performances have been upbeat songs that weren't ballads. Season 1 winner Kelly Clarkson was known for her bubbly performances, including her classic, "Stuff Like That There." I also enjoyed season 5 winner Taylor Hicks' exciting performances of songs such as "Takin' It to the Streets," "Living for the City," "Play That Funky Music," "Jailhouse Rock," and "Try a Little Tenderness." His dancing always made me smile.
Related
After Katy Perry's Space Mission, I'm Convinced Retooling The American Idol Judges Panel With Carrie Underwood Was The Right Move
Katy Perry has just completed a space mission which has me convinced that American Idol was right to replace her with Carrie Underwood.
In addition, American Idol season 5 runner-up Katharine McPhee often wowed the crowd with her uptempo songs and dancing in performances such as "Since I Fell for You," "Think," "Bringing Out the Elvis," "Black Horse and the Cherry Tree," and "Hound Dog/All Shook Up." They made it to the final two of their season because they were so much fun to watch, and I always looked forward to seeing what they'd do next.
Taylor and Katharine are just two examples of people who really brought star quality to the show by taking chances with songs other than ballads now and then. Of course, they also sang some gorgeous ballads during their time on American Idol, but they were much more versatile than today's contestants.
American Idol seems to have forgotten that part of its purpose is to entertain viewers, and not just showcase vocals. Although I know that the performances are technically great, I find it very tiresome to watch the contestants singing ballad after ballad, as though that's the only way to prove that they're good performers. It seems a bit self-indulgent, when they should be focusing on crowd-pleasing performances. Being an entertainer also requires singers to work the crowd, get them involved, and maybe even dance a bit. It's not as though the themes haven't allowed for that.
American Idol Should Have A Night Without Ballads
The Show Should Challenge The Finalists To Move Out Of Their Comfort Zones
I know that the American Idol Top 10 finalists could really benefit from the show forcing them not to sing ballads. They all have great personalities that just aren't coming through each week. I want to see them move out of their comfort zones and do something fun and exciting to enhance their phenomenal performances. However, American Idol must enforce the theme.
During American Idol season 22, I think that the show was trying to do this with their Songs That Make You Want to Dance Night, but Emmy Russell turned Walk the Moon's "Shut Up and Dance" into a ballad, and even sat at the piano during her performance. I wanted to see her come out of her shell, but it didn't happen. However, if American Idol devoted a night to songs that weren't ballads, then the contestants wouldn't be able to do this.
As an American Idol fan since season 1, I really miss seeing contestants take chances on the show by singing songs other than ballads. I think that the show should have a theme night during which the finalists aren't allowed to sing them. It would breathe new life into the show and make it much more entertaining to watch. I want to be able to watch an entire episode without feeling like I'm being sung to sleep. American Idol season 23 needs to put the ballads to bed.
American Idol airs Sundays and Mondays at 8 p.m. EDT on ABC.
Source: American Idol/YouTube, iwan13111980/YouTube, American Idol/YouTube

text:
Madagascar se torna primeiro beneficiÃ¡rio de mecanismo climÃ¡tico do FMI e BM 21/06/2024 20h25
Madagascar serÃ¡ o primeiro paÃ­s beneficiado pelo programa conjunto entre o Fundo MonetÃ¡rio internacional (FMI) e o Banco Mundial (BM) para estimular a aÃ§Ã£o pelo clima, atravÃ©s de um emprÃ©stimo de US$ 321 milhÃµes (R$ 1,7 bilhÃ£o, na cotaÃ§Ã£o atual) liberados pelas organizaÃ§Ãµes nesta sexta-feira (21).
"AtravÃ©s deste mecanismo, os esforÃ§os coordenados pelo Banco Mundial e o FMI tentarÃ£o continuar apoiando a capacidade de adaptaÃ§Ã£o do paÃ­s Ã s mudanÃ§as climÃ¡ticas, em estreita colaboraÃ§Ã£o com outros parceiro para o desenvolvimento", afirmaram as instituiÃ§Ãµes em uma declaraÃ§Ã£o conjunta. "A mudanÃ§a climÃ¡tica estÃ¡ impulsionando a pobreza em Madagascar", acrescentaram.
O programa de colaboraÃ§Ã£o, que propÃµe um trabalho mais estreito entre as instituiÃ§Ãµes multilaterais, foi anunciado em maio para ajudar os paÃ­ses a intensificarem seus esforÃ§os frente Ã  crise climÃ¡tica.
Desta maneira, Madagascar, ilha situada no Oceano Ãndico, poderÃ¡ ser beneficiada por um emprÃ©stimo de 321 milhÃµes de dÃ³lares), aprovado pela direÃ§Ã£o-executiva do FMI e concedido pelo marco da "Linha de ResiliÃªncia e Sustentabilidade".
A colaboraÃ§Ã£o entre o FMI e o BC cobrem "a promoÃ§Ã£o de investimentos verdes, resilientes e de intervenÃ§Ãµes de adaptaÃ§Ã£o que trarÃ£o benefÃ­cios imediatos ao desenvolvimento".
"Madagascar tambÃ©m adotarÃ¡ uma estratÃ©gia nacional para mobilizar o financiamento climÃ¡tico, com o objetivo de reforÃ§ar sua posiÃ§Ã£o como destino atrativo para investimentos relacionados ao clima", afirmaram as organizaÃ§Ãµes.
TambÃ©m nesta sexta, o FMI anunciou a aprovaÃ§Ã£o de outro emprÃ©stimo no valor de 337 milhÃµes de dÃ³lares (1,8 bilhÃ£o de reais), em 36 meses, para Madagascar, como parte da mesma linha de financiamento. Esse valor jÃ¡ inclui US$ 312,4 milhÃµes (1,8 bilhÃ£o de reais, em cotaÃ§Ã£o da Ã©poca) de um emprÃ©stimo concedido em marÃ§o de 2021, que foi posteriormente cancelado e agora reintegrado ao novo pacote.

author: Damilola Makinde
title: Latest news for students sitting for JAMB from April 19 to 29 2024
text:
The Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board (JAMB) has reaffirmed its commitment to a fair and secure testing environment for the 2024 Unified Tertiary Matriculation Examination (UTME). In line with the latest news for JAMB 2024, certain items are strictly prohibited as they can potentially facilitate cheating. Being familiar with this list is crucial for all candidates to avoid disqualification.
Protecting JAMB exam integrity JAMB emphasises that these banned items have been used in the past to gain an unfair advantage. The latest JAMB 2024 news highlights JAMBâ€™s zero-tolerance policy towards examination malpractice. By prohibiting these items, JAMB aims to ensure a level playing field for all candidates and uphold the integrity of the UTME.
List of JAMB prohibited items 2024
Hereâ€™s a comprehensive breakdown of the items strictly forbidden in the JAMB exam hall, as per the â€œlatest JAMB news 2024â€:
Mobile Phones or Similar Electronic Devices: This includes even switched-off phones, tablets, and any device with communication capabilities. Wristwatches: Smartwatches with any additional functionalities beyond basic timekeeping are not allowed. Pen or Biro (Except Approved): If it will be allowed, itâ€™ll only be blue or black. Double-check for any additional instructions regarding specific pen types. Spy or Reading Glasses (Unless Medically Prescribed): Unaided vision is expected during the exam. Calculators (Except Approved Models): JAMB prohibits students from bringing calculators into the examination hall. USB Drives, Hard Disks, or Similar Storage Devices: No external storage devices are allowed. Books or Any Reading/Writing Material (Except JAMB-Approved): Rely solely on your prepared knowledge; no external reference materials are permitted. Cameras and Recorders: Capturing visuals or audio within the exam hall is a serious offence. Microphones and Earpieces: These can be used for unauthorised communication. Beyond the List: Additional Precautions The latest JAMB news 2024 goes beyond just listing banned items. JAMB also advises candidates to avoid:
Decorative designs or tattoos on palms: These might interfere with biometric screening at the exam centre. Instructions to parents and guardians The latest JAMB news bulletin also stresses the importance of parental involvement. While offering support is crucial, parents and guardians must strictly adhere to JAMB regulations. Hereâ€™s what you can do to help:
Review JAMB website: Familiarise yourself with the banned items list and discuss it with your child. Advise against loitering near exam centres: JAMB strictly prohibits parents from being present during the exam. Respect these guidelines to avoid penalties for your child. JAMB latest news on Punctuality The latest JAMB news 2024 also emphasises the importance of punctuality. JAMB has a strict policy regarding latecomers:
Candidates arriving 30 minutes after the exam start time will not be allowed to enter the exam hall. Latecomers will be marked absent and will not be allowed to participate in the exam. Final thoughts on latest news for students sitting for JAMB from April 19 to 29 2024 Please follow these guidelines and stay updated with the latest JAMB news 2024 on only verified news platforms like TechCabal or JAMB website.

title: Cazzu llevÃ³ a otro nivel el look de la venganza con la que cautiva en redes sociales
text:
Cazzu llevÃ³ a otro nivel el look de la venganza con la que cautiva en redes sociales
[Ãšnete al canal de Whatsapp de Wapa](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va74JgYIXnlju3agk203)
La separaciÃ³n entre
[Cazzu y Christian Nodal](https://wapa.pe/espectaculos-y-tv/celebridades/2024/07/25/cazzu-demanda-nodal-contundente-razon-pero-responde-estocada-final-cazzu-pension-nodal-hijos-demanda-millones-406625) fue uno de los escÃ¡ndalos mÃ¡s comentado del aÃ±o. Y tras un largo silencio, la cantante argentina regresÃ³ al show business por la puerta grande y ahora deslumbrÃ³ con un gran look que llamÃ³ la atenciÃ³n de sus seguidores y que muchos calificaron como el [â€˜look de la venganzaâ€™](https://wapa.pe/moda-y-belleza/2023/08/20/vanessa-lopez-deslumbra-su-propio-look-venganza-enfrentamiento-carlos-tomate-barraza-carlos-tomate-barraza-magaly-medina-magaly-tv-atv--1593260), pero renovado, ya que no es la misma prenda que elevÃ³ al estrellato a Lady Di.
La cantante argentina, Cazzu compartiÃ³ una publicaciÃ³n donde se la ve luciendo un conjunto de dos piezas de lencerÃ­a, si bien no es un outfit que se use para mostrar en la calle. La artista se puso una tendencia que muchas mujeres hemos adquirido.
El look de la venganza: Cazzu brilla mÃ¡s que nunca
Como se recuerda, hace unos dÃ­as Cazzu lanzÃ³ una nueva canciÃ³n y las redes sociales reventaron, y en una Ãºltima publicaciÃ³n en Instagram, la artista subiÃ³ una foto en un espejo, con un look que muchos llamaron â€˜look de la venganzaâ€™. En la imagen, la cantante sin tapujos se muestra al natural y mostrando seguridad. La foto, tomada en Miami, sumo varios comentarios que muestran empoderamiento. â€œCazzu siempre regiaâ€, â€œBrillando mÃ¡s que nunca desde que se alejÃ³ de Nodalâ€, y â€œCazzu diciÃ©ndole a Nodal que no lo necesitaâ€.
Cazzu luciÃ³ lencerÃ­a estilo Boudoir
El estilo boudoir es una tendencia que evoca la elegancia y sensualidad de las habitaciones privadas (tambiÃ©n conocidas como boudoirs), y se traslada al dÃ­a a dÃ­a este 2025.
Ropa interior transparente y piezas confeccionadas en satÃ©n, seda y encajes, se convierten en protagonistas del look.
TambiÃ©n, las prendas loungewear y los detalles como cintas y lazos estarÃ¡n en auge y serÃ¡n un must-have para cualquier ocasiÃ³n.
